laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Plasma TG levels fluctuated between 696 and 2400 mg/dl (7.86 and 27.1 mmol/liter) due to poor compliance with treatment.

changes_over_time.LPL_activity: Reduced by 76% compared to normolipidemic controls.
changes_over_time.LPL_mass: Reduced by 50% compared to normolipidemic controls.
changes_over_time.HL_activity: Reduced by 27% compared to normolipidemic controls.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved lipid profile after starting insulin therapy along with hypolipidemic treatment.
